definitions.definition: An area where a fair (an event for public entertainment) or other public event is held; a showground .
A commercially-operated collection of rides, games and other entertainment attractions; an amusement park .

main_definition: An area where a fair (an event for public entertainment) or other public event is held; a showground .
secondary_definitions: A commercially-operated collection of rides, games and other entertainment attractions; an amusement park .
